val:
• Developed simple yet highly interactive web applications on JAVA Full stack .
  • Built and shipped the Apple Music Extension within Facebook Messenger leveraging third-party and internal APIs
  • Architected and implemented different microservices and deployed each one of them individually in docker using Linux and for production level , deployed the code in AWS cloud using CICD.
  • Manually tested applications in various browsers and mobile devices to ensure cross-browser compatibility and responsiveness
